Communication

Class Message

  • java.lang.Object
    • Communication.Message
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Message
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Generic message that will pass through the socket
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
